sourcesContent: import{useMemo as o,useReducer as c}from"react";import{useIsoMorphicEffect as h}from'./use-iso-morphic-effect.js';function s(e){if(e===null)return{width:0,height:0};let{width:n,height:t}=e.getBoundingClientRect();return{width:n,height:t}}function f(e,n=!1){let t=e===null?null:"current"in e?e.current:e,[l,u]=c(()=>({}),{}),r=o(()=>s(t),[t,l]);return h(()=>{if(!t)return;let i=new ResizeObserver(u);return i.observe(t),()=>{i.disconnect()}},[t]),n?{width:`${r.width}px`,height:`${r.height}px`}:r}export{f as useElementSize};
